title: AI Video Generator Demo
description: A sample script demonstrating the AI Video Generator capabilities

scenes.title: Introduction
scenes.text: Welcome to the AI Video Generator! This powerful tool can create professional videos from text using local AI models.
scenes.background_prompt: modern office environment with clean white background

scenes.title: Features
scenes.text: Our AI Video Generator offers multiple features including text-to-speech, avatar generation, talking head animation, and scene creation.
scenes.background_prompt: futuristic technology lab with holographic displays

scenes.title: Benefits
scenes.text: With this tool, you can create engaging videos without expensive equipment or professional video editing skills. Everything runs locally on your machine for complete privacy.
scenes.background_prompt: creative workspace with colorful design elements

scenes.title: Conclusion
scenes.text: Start creating amazing videos today! The AI Video Generator is your gateway to professional video content creation.
scenes.background_prompt: professional conference room with city view
